content: @nikomatsakis I made a document with various suggestions on improving the survey for next year. Let me know if there's place I should link to this so that it doesn't get lost/forgotten. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WYaePLm7482ClWE8f0ofuYp3poVDn9Cu24MNiLl2DSY/edit?usp=sharing
On the docs with the translators mails maybe ?
Since they are contacted again the following year to ask if they have time to volunteer again
I think the 2020 survey coordination document is a good place
